hero.title: Data-Driven Employee Engagement with Mood Whisper
hero.description: Harness the power of real-time analytics to boost workplace happiness and productivity.

featuresSection.title: Powerful Features for Employee Engagement
featuresSection.description: Discover the comprehensive tools and capabilities that make Mood Whisper the leading employee engagement platform.

cta.title: Ready to Harness the Power of Data?
cta.description: Join the data-driven revolution in employee engagement. Start your journey towards a more productive and happier workplace with Mood Whisper today.

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your Mood Whisper account and set up your organization profile.

step2.title: Invite Team
step2.description: Invite your employees to join the platform and start sharing their moods.

step3.title: Track & Analyze
step3.description: Monitor real-time mood data and analyze trends to improve workplace satisfaction.

step4.title: Take Action
step4.description: Implement changes based on insights to boost employee engagement and productivity.

howItWorks.title: How Our Prediction Model Works
howItWorks.description: Our prediction model helps you anticipate engagement trends, allowing you to take proactive measures to maintain high employee satisfaction and productivity.

features.feature3: Considers various factors such as team dynamics, workload, and company events
features.feature4: Continuously learns and improves predictions over time
features.feature5: Provides actionable insights to improve employee engagement

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams just getting started

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for growing companies with advanced needs

survey.title: Employee Engagement Survey
survey.description: Please answer the following questions on a scale of 1-10

questions.jobSatisfaction: How satisfied are you with your current role?
questions.careerAlignment: How well does your work align with your career goals?
questions.workLifeBalance: How would you rate the work-life balance in your current position?
questions.recognition: How satisfied are you with the recognition you receive for your work?
questions.teamCommunication: How would you rate the communication within your team?
questions.professionalGrowth: How satisfied are you with the opportunities for professional growth?
questions.diversityAndInclusion: How would you rate the company's commitment to diversity and inclusion?
questions.compensationAndBenefits: How satisfied are you with your current compensation and benefits?
questions.companyCulture: How would you rate the overall company culture?
questions.recommendation: How likely are you to recommend this company as a great place to work?

additionalFeedback.label: Additional Feedback
additionalFeedback.placeholder: Please provide any additional feedback or comments here...

authError.title: Authentication Error
authError.description: You must be signed in to submit a survey.
authError.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

errors.title: Error
errors.description: Failed to submit survey. Please try again.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: Mood Whisper's data-driven approach has revolutionized our employee engagement strategy. We've seen a 25% increase in overall job satisfaction since implementation.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: The predictive analytics from Mood Whisper have helped us proactively address potential issues, resulting in a 15% decrease in turnover and a 20% boost in productivity.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.content: The customizable dashboards allow us to track the metrics that matter most to our creative team. We've improved our project completion rate by 30% thanks to the insights from Mood Whisper.

userManagement.importUsersDialogDescription: Upload a CSV file containing user information. The file should include columns for email, firstName, lastName, and optional columns for role, gender, team.
userManagement.importUsersAlertDescription: Required CSV format: email, firstName, lastName, role (optional), gender (optional), team (optional)
